title: Marketing Like a Boss — Psychology, Virality, and Growth in the Modern World
description:
Want to master the psychology behind why people buy, how ideas go viral, and what actually drives sustainable brand growth? This course takes you on a comprehensive journey from marketing fundamentals to advanced strategies, learning directly from the world's leading marketing scientists, psychologists, bestselling authors, and proven practitioners.

You'll learn from an exceptional panel of experts including Dr. Robert Cialdini (the "Godfather of Influence" whose research has shaped modern marketing), Professor Byron Sharp (Director of the world's largest marketing research institute), Seth Godin (three-time Marketing Hall of Fame inductee and author of 19 bestselling books), Jonah Berger (Wharton professor and author of "Contagious"), and Nir Eyal (author of "Hooked" on building habit-forming products).

The course also features real-world practitioners who've achieved extraordinary results: Gina Gotthilf who grew Duolingo to 200 million users through PR and viral marketing, Tim Ferriss who built his podcast to 700+ million downloads, Sean Riley who built DUDE Wipes into a $150M brand, and April Dunford, the world's leading positioning expert who advises Google, IBM, and Epic Games.

In the Beginner section, you'll build a solid foundation in marketing psychology and consumer behavior. You'll discover why traditional mass marketing no longer works, learn the seven universal principles of persuasion, understand what makes content contagious, and see real-world examples of content marketing and viral growth execution. These episodes feature accessible interviews that make complex psychology and strategy easy to grasp.

The Intermediate section gets tactical. You'll learn frameworks for building habit-forming products, master strategic positioning to stand out in crowded markets, explore behavioral science applications in marketing, and discover how SEO and content marketing work together. These episodes feature CMOs, growth leaders, and founders sharing the exact strategies they used to build successful brands and drive measurable growth.

The Advanced section dives deep into marketing science and sophisticated strategy. You'll challenge conventional marketing wisdom with evidence-based research, explore the psychology of habit formation and ethical persuasion at a deep level, understand positioning at scale, and learn the scientific laws of brand growth backed by decades of research. These episodes require you to think like a marketing scientist, questioning assumptions and following evidence.

What makes this course unique is its foundation in both rigorous research and proven execution. You're not learning from generic "marketing gurus" — every expert either has academic credentials (professors at top universities, published researchers), executive experience (CMOs, VPs of Growth, founders), or documented results (bestselling books, $150M brands built, 200M users grown). The course balances timeless psychological principles with modern growth tactics, ensuring you understand both why marketing works and how to execute it.

By the end of this course, you'll understand the psychology of persuasion and influence, know how to make ideas and products contagious, master positioning and differentiation strategies, understand evidence-based brand building, and have frameworks for building engagement and driving sustainable growth. Whether you're a marketer, entrepreneur, founder, or brand builder, this course will transform how you think about and execute marketing.

The 18 episodes span diverse perspectives — from academic researchers to in-the-trenches operators, from multi-decade thought leaders to founders who've scaled from zero to hundreds of millions of users. You'll hear from 13 different world-class experts across 18 different podcasts, ensuring you get a complete, nuanced understanding of modern marketing rather than a single perspective.

This is marketing education from the people who've actually done it, researched it, and proven it works. No fluff, no get-rich-quick schemes — just evidence-based strategies and battle-tested tactics from the absolute best in the field.
